p: The effect of TTO volatile oil on pre-formed biofilm was related to the concentration used and the strain tested. At 4 × MIC concentration, TTO essential oil was able to eradicate the pre-formed S. aureus (Sa15 strain) biofilm on both polystyrene and glass surfaces with a percentages ranging from (59.05 ± 2.83%) to (40.85 ± 1.61%), respectively ( Figure 3).
